DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with rosuvastatin for 6 months in obese type 2 diabetic women will improve their lipid profiles and thus prevent the progression to cardiovascular disease.
DOC.brief_title: C-Reactive Protein (CRP) in Obese Diabetic Women
DOC.criteria: Menopausal Diagnosed diabetes mellitus type 2 Obese (body mass index [BMI] > 25 ≤ 30) Fasting blood glucose ≥ 200 mg/dl CRP < 2 mg/L and > 10 mg/L
